message.content:
Sure, I can help you with that! Here's a sample healthy meal plan for today:

Breakfast:
- 1 cup of Greek yogurt with berries and nuts
- 2 slices of whole grain toast with almond butter
- Green smoothie made with spinach, kale, banana, almond milk, and chia seeds

Snack:
- Apple with peanut butter
- Roasted almonds

Lunch:
- Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (such as zucchini, bell peppers, and onions)
- Brown rice or quinoa
- Green salad with vinaigrette dressing

Snack:
- Carrot sticks with hummus

Dinner:
- Baked salmon with roasted sweet potatoes and steamed broccoli
- Steamed green beans
- Salad with balsamic vinaigrette dressing

Remember to drink plenty of water throughout the day and adjust the portions according to your individual needs. Enjoy your healthy meal plan!
